item.title: Deadly winter storm grips large parts of the US
item.description: A powerful winter storm swept across the country, with heavy snow, ice and dangerously low temperatures affecting millions.

item.title: Ukrainians are sharing hacks online on how to survive winter power cuts - NPR
item.description: Ukrainians are sharing hacks online on how to survive winter power cuts NPRHere in One Kyiv Apartment Building, They Are Freezing—but Not Giving Up The Wall Street JournalRussian attacks on Ukraine kill 1 and wound 31 people ahead of second day of peace talks ABC NewsRussia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,431 Al JazeeraRussian strike on Ukraine’s Kyiv leaves 1,330 buildings still without heat, mayor says Reuters

item.title: At least 30 dead as severe winter storm coats US in snow and ice
item.description: Snow storm was set to become the costliest severe weather disruption with estimated losses between $105bn to $115bn.

item.title: Much of US digging out from snow, sleet, ice from massive winter storm
item.description: A huge winter storm has brought frigid temperatures, snow, and sleet to more than a dozen US states.
